summary: An email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to an unspecified recipient (likely a Bureau of Prisons official) regarding her client Ghislaine Maxwell. Sternheim seeks confirmation and details about Maxwell being placed in quarantine (SHU) after a COVID-19 test, and inquires about the status of scheduled legal calls and visits.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell; sends an email inquiring about Maxwell's quarantine status and the impact on scheduled legal communications.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The incarcerated client of Bobbi Sternheim; reportedly received a nasal swab test and is being placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) for 14 days.

connections.description: Sternheim is identified as the attorney for Maxwell, scheduling legal calls and visits and advocating on her behalf regarding quarantine conditions.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Placed in Quarantine
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell receives a nasal swab test and is placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) for a 14-day quarantine period.

events.title: Scheduled Legal Call for Maxwell
events.description: A confirmed legal call is scheduled between Ghislaine Maxwell and her attorney, Bobbi Sternheim.

events.title: Scheduled In-Person Legal Visit
events.description: A confirmed in-person legal visit is scheduled between Ghislaine Maxwell and her attorney, Bobbi Sternheim.

locations: Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim, 33 West 19th Street - 4th Floor, New York, NY 10011
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was in federal custody (inmate number 02879-509) as of November 2020.
Maxwell received a COVID-19 nasal swab test and was placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) for a 14-day quarantine.
Defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim was actively representing Maxwell, scheduling legal communications and challenging her quarantine conditions.
The correspondence highlights operational challenges (quarantine, canceled visits) within the prison system during the COVID-19 pandemic.
The document is a direct attorney-client communication seeking official confirmation about the terms and impact of Maxwell's quarantine.
